name: Basicare Foot Rasp Pedicure Brush
description:
Specially designed to eliminate calluses and hardened skin on your hands and feet. It is safe and easy to use. Germs are often invisible to your naked eyes. It is essential to have a good grooming tool for effective cleaning of your feet. 

DIRECTION: It is best to use on moist skin. Simply soak the affected area in warm water to soften skin. Start with a pedicure brush to remove dirt and bacteria. Follow with the callus rasp. Work back & forth with a push/pull motion.

CARE: Clean rasp and brush after each use. To prevent rusting, have the rasp lightly oiled and kept in a dry place. Diabetics should contact a doctor before using this product. Keep out of reach of children.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
